projectContent.text:
Surcos y cimas\
this is a beautiful realm\
of chaos, opposite directions and cackles\
a mule looks at the sun\
it's red and it pierces his eyes\
lifts a leg to feel the heat\
it's day by night snake crawls across the grassland\
on a woman's back\
inscribed the burst\
the axe in the neck of the chicken\
mother\
in the cloudy sky\
the future is drawn\
\* clairvoyance and revolution".\
\
Vinyl EP\
Unique edition\
50 copies with certificate

**Music**\
Sara Fernandez\
\
**Box design**\
Pablo Baresch\
\
**Performance**\
Sara Fernández, María Rojas Arias\
\
**Production**\
La Vulcanizadora\
Andrés Jurado, María Rojas Arias
